article_title: William McGurn: Feliz Día de San Patricio
article_text:
This St. Patrick’s Day, the Irish prime minister will once again present the American president with a Waterford bowl filled with shamrocks in a tradition that dates to Harry Truman.

In the East Room reception, the grandchildren and great-grandchildren of hod carriers and bricklayers will partake of corned beef sandwiches prepared by the White House chef. Amid tales of St. Patrick ridding Ireland of snakes and gentle jabs at the...

twitter.description: In The Wall Street Journal, Main Street columnist William McGurn writes that what Catholic schools did for the Irish in the 19th century they can do for Latinos today.
twitter.title: Feliz Día de San Patricio

article_metadata.author: William McGurn

article_summary:
Amid tales of St. Patrick ridding Ireland of snakes and gentle jabs at the...
In the East Room reception, the grandchildren and great-grandchildren of hod carriers and bricklayers will partake of corned beef sandwiches prepared by the White House chef.
This St. Patrick’s Day, the Irish prime minister will once again present the American president with a Waterford bowl filled with shamrocks in a tradition that dates to Harry Truman.
